trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Regenerate Keys</languageKeyword> asynchronous operation regenerates the primary or secondary access key for the specified storage account.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Regenerate Keys</languageKeyword> asynchronous operation regenerates the primary or secondary access key for the specified storage account.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Regenerate Keys</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Regenerate Keys</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;service-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the desired storage account.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;service-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the desired storage account.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the primary or secondary access key for the specified storage account must be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the primary or secondary access key for the specified storage account must be regenerated.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2009-10-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2009-10-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: The request body indicates which key to regenerate, the primary key or the secondary key.
trans-unit.target: The request body indicates which key to regenerate, the primary key or the secondary key.

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: For an asynchronous operation, you can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> with the value of the header to determine whether the operation is complete, has failed, or is still in progress.
trans-unit.target: For an asynchronous operation, you can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> with the value of the header to determine whether the operation is complete, has failed, or is still in progress.

trans-unit.source: The response returns both the primary and secondary access keys.
trans-unit.target: The response returns both the primary and secondary access keys.

trans-unit.source: The format of the response body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the response body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the response body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the response body.

trans-unit.source: The Service Management API request URI used to perform <link xlink:href="06de06a9-3363-4c03-8a99-3fbaf761642c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Storage Account Properties</link> requests against the storage account.
trans-unit.target: The Service Management API request URI used to perform <link xlink:href="06de06a9-3363-4c03-8a99-3fbaf761642c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Storage Account Properties</link> requests against the storage account.

trans-unit.source: The primary key for the specified storage account.
trans-unit.target: The primary key for the specified storage account.

trans-unit.source: The secondary key for the specified storage account.
trans-unit.target: The secondary key for the specified storage account.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Regenerate Storage Account Keys</languageKeyword> operation causes the Primary or Secondary key for a storage account service to be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Regenerate Storage Account Keys</languageKeyword> operation causes the Primary or Secondary key for a storage account service to be regenerated.

trans-unit.source: This operation can be used with the storage accounts returned by the <link xlink:href="63ee7d2c-9320-4d13-a7c6-6f605a8b312e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Storage Accounts</link> operation, to automate management of storage key updates.
trans-unit.target: This operation can be used with the storage accounts returned by the <link xlink:href="63ee7d2c-9320-4d13-a7c6-6f605a8b312e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Storage Accounts</link> operation, to automate management of storage key updates.

trans-unit.source: The following example program takes the subscription ID, an associated management certificate thumbprint, the operation version string, and a storage account name, and prints the returned storage account access keys to the console.
trans-unit.target: The following example program takes the subscription ID, an associated management certificate thumbprint, the operation version string, and a storage account name, and prints the returned storage account access keys to the console.

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <languageKeyword>Regenerate Storage Account Keys</languageKeyword> operation to regenerate the Secondary access key for the storage account, and prints the new key results.
trans-unit.target: It then calls the <languageKeyword>Regenerate Storage Account Keys</languageKeyword> operation to regenerate the Secondary access key for the storage account, and prints the new key results.

trans-unit.source: Initialize the <codeInline>Version</codeInline> constant with a version header string, <codeInline>SubscriptionId</codeInline> with the GUID identifier for the subscription, <codeInline>Thumbprint</codeInline> with your management certificate thumbprint value, and <codeInline>ServiceName</codeInline> with the name of your storage account to run the example code.
trans-unit.target: Initialize the <codeInline>Version</codeInline> constant with a version header string, <codeInline>SubscriptionId</codeInline> with the GUID identifier for the subscription, <codeInline>Thumbprint</codeInline> with your management certificate thumbprint value, and <codeInline>ServiceName</codeInline> with the name of your storage account to run the example code.

trans-unit.source: This example program generates results similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: This example program generates results similar to the following:
